verse: These are the words of the Eternal, Commander of heavenly armies:
Then the Eternal One will unequivocally accept the sweet offering of Judah and Jerusalem as He did in the days of old, as in the former years when the covenant was new.

Then those who fear the Eternal One consulted each other about Godâ€™s charges, each one to his neighbor, and the Eternal One paid attention and heard. A book of remembrance was written before Him for those who honored the Eternal One and valued His name and the good reputation.
And you will return and notice the difference between the righteous and the wicked, between those serving God and those not serving Him.
